sentence.Network_en: The results indicate that chloramine is of notable inactivation effect on Cyclops.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果表明,氯胺对剑水蚤具有显著的灭活作用.

sentence.Network_en: Clearly, the application of brine or ammonia is feasible to control the growth of Cyclops.
sentence.Network_cn: 可见, 采用盐水或氨水浸泡活性炭滤池来控制剑水蚤的生长是可行的.

sentence.Network_en: Cyclops is a strong hand - to - hand fighter, with an ability to attack walls, when in siege battle.
sentence.Network_cn: 独眼巨人是强力的近战兵种, 并且具有在攻城战中破坏城墙的能力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...还有“妄想，奇想”的意思，能够把蛇、山羊和狮子这几种风马牛不相及的东西拼凑在一起的确非“奇想”莫属。cyclops（独眼巨人）希腊神话中居住在西西里岛上的三位风暴之神——brontes（雷神）、sterops（电神）和arge.

means.word_mean: 1. minute free-swimming freshwater copepod having a large median eye and pear-shaped body and long antennae used in swimming; important in some food chains and as intermediate hosts of parasitic worms that affect man e.g. Guinea worms
